review: I ordered two black binders, and when they arrived, each one of them had multiple air pocket or bubble under the "skin" of the binder both on the fronts and the backs.  The functionality is fine, but I'm disappointed in these binders as they were supposed to be used in performances.  With the bubbles and resulting wrinkles, these binders look unprofessional.  Otherwise, they seem solid and functional.
productTitle: Avery Heavy-Duty Binder with 2-Inch One Touch EZD Ring, Blue (79882)
